description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Félicité, Seychelles. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Seychelles Private Island Pool Villa Luxury by Iconic Six Senses
hotels.description: Indulge in barefoot luxury at the dreamy Six Senses Zil Pasyon, a private island resort with a collection of exclusive infinity pool villas. This idyllic oasis occupies less than a third of the total island of Félicité, with its raw natural beauty, coral-fringed beaches, granite rock formations and verdant greenery. Considered one of the satellites of La Digue, the island is encircled by Praslin, Grande Soeur, Petite Soeur, Coco and Marianne, offering the ultimate island-hopping opportunity. Make the most of your serene retreat by exploring the island's natural wonders. Swim with turtles, climb to Félicité's highest point for panoramic views or watch the birdlife. Later, recharge within the resort and make use of the luxurious facilities onsite. Indulge at one of the exquisite restaurants onsite, dive into the sparkling pool, or treat yourself to a luxurious spa treatment. For an active escape, drop into the 24-hour fitness centre or go hiking along the many trails that wrap around the resort.
